pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Codenames[![Tests](https://github.com/asaf-kali/codenames/actions/workflows/tests.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/asaf-kali/codenames/actions/workflows/tests.yml)[![Lint](https://github.com/asaf-kali/codenames/actions/workflows/lint.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/asaf-kali/codenames/actions/workflows/lint.yml)[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/codenames.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/codenames)Code infrastructure for the Codenames board game.
